Making a Timing Solution

Accompanying Lecture: Video 1, Video 2

A fantastic resource, written by Paulo Friere, to guide you in creating your first timing solution can be found INSERT LINK

What is a timing solution?

A timing solution for a pulsar is a physically motivated model that attempts to predict when the next pulse of radiation from a pulsar will arrive at Earth.
